job_tasks.phrase: You will work as part of a distributed agile team developing and testing the RWS software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of developing and testing software within a team, which falls under traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: The fast-paced agile development cycle will require you to use several testing approaches, design and write test automation code as well as executing manual testing.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the practical application of software development principles to testing, including writing automation code and manual testing within an agile framework.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be a part of a product team that consists of highly skilled and experienced Java developers and QA engineers and work closely with them to deliver high-quality and innovative software.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the collaborative aspect of software development and the goal of delivering high-quality software, aligning with integration and development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Our teams build scalable Java microservices based on Spring, JPA 2.0, OpenSearch, GraphQL, OpenAPI RESTful web service and more to support our Tridion Content Management products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of software components (microservices) using specific technologies, which is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: These microservices are provided to customers on-premise and supported in the cloud using Docker-based AWS container services.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the deployment and support of software services, which is part of the software development lifecycle and integration into operational environments.

job_tasks.phrase: Our customers include many big-name brands. So, you can imagine the technological challenges we face in order to provide a scalable architecture that not only does what customers want, but also performs well.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the engineering challenges related to scalability and performance of software architecture, which are core to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: define and drive technical initiatives to keep the platform current and more efficient.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to improving and maintaining the software platform, which is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Create test plans based on Risk-based testing technique
job_tasks.justification: Creating test plans is a fundamental part of the software development lifecycle, specifically for ensuring quality.

job_tasks.phrase: Define the required QA coverage for the stories in the team Grooming and Planning meetings
job_tasks.justification: Defining QA coverage is an integral part of the software development process, ensuring that new features are adequately tested.

job_tasks.phrase: Execute automated and manual tests in accordance with the test plan
job_tasks.justification: Executing tests, both automated and manual, is a direct software development and quality assurance task.
Setting up and configuring testing environments is a crucial part of the software development and deployment process.

job_tasks.phrase: Co-ordinate with the developers, reproduce issues when required, and steer the defect through its lifecycle
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaboration with developers and managing the defect lifecycle, which are standard software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Define the scope of regression testing for every release using a Risk-based approach
job_tasks.justification: Defining regression testing scope is a key task in ensuring the quality and stability of software releases.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and create automated test cases in the Java automation suite
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct software development task focused on creating automated testing solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Seek out and identify opportunities for test automation
job_tasks.justification: Proactively finding ways to improve the software development process through automation is a software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and monitor nightly runs of automated tests
job_tasks.justification: Designing and monitoring automated test runs is part of ensuring the continuous quality of software development.
Performance testing is a critical aspect of software development to ensure the application meets performance requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze performance test results and provide comprehensible results
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing test results and communicating them is a standard part of the software development and quality assurance process.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work as part of a distributed agile team developing and testing the RWS software.
soft_skills.justification: Working as part of a distributed agile team implies collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be a part of a product team that consists of highly skilled and experienced Java developers and QA engineers and work closely with them to deliver high-quality and innovative software.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly states working closely with other skilled professionals, indicating collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Co-ordinate with the developers, reproduce issues when required, and steer the defect through its lifecycle
soft_skills.justification: Coordination with developers and managing defects requires strong communication and collaboration.
Directly states a willingness to learn and grow, which is a key aspect of adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: interested in facing and overcoming technical challenges.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates a proactive approach to dealing with and solving technical difficulties.

soft_skills.phrase: define and drive technical initiatives to keep the platform current and more efficient.
soft_skills.justification: Driving initiatives to improve efficiency suggests problem-solving and a pragmatic approach to system enhancement.

soft_skills.phrase: Seek out and identify opportunities for test automation
soft_skills.justification: Proactively identifying opportunities for automation demonstrates a problem-solving mindset focused on improving processes.

soft_skills.phrase: Analyze performance test results and provide comprehensible results
soft_skills.justification: Analyzing complex data (performance test results) and making it understandable is a problem-solving task.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on traditional software engineering tasks related to testing, development, and maintenance of Java-based microservices. There is no mention of AI, ML, Generative AI, LLMs, or related concepts. The tasks are all within Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering), specifically related to quality assurance and software development practices. Therefore, the most appropriate profile is 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the responsibilities and technologies involved. It explicitly describes a QA Engineer role focused on Java-based enterprise software, with no indication of AI/ML involvement. This clarity makes the analysis straightforward and highly confident.
